Uses of Class
edu.rit.image.Color

  • Packages that use Color 
    Package Description
    edu.rit.image
    Package edu.rit.image contains classes for creating image files.
    edu.rit.image.png
    Package edu.rit.image.png contains classes for creating PNG image files.

    • Uses of Color in edu.rit.image

      Methods in edu.rit.image that return Color 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Color ColorArray.color(int i)
      Get the color of the given element of this color array.
      Color Color.gray(float gray)
      Set this color object to the given floating point gray value.
      Color Color.gray(int gray)
      Set this color object to the given integer gray value.
      Color Color.hsb(float hue, float sat, float bri)
      Set this color object from the given floating point hue, saturation, and brightness components.
      Color Color.rgb(float red, float green, float blue)
      Set this color object from the given floating point red, green, and blue components.
      Color Color.rgb(int rgb)
      Set this color object from the given packed RGB representation.
      Color Color.rgb(int red, int green, int blue)
      Set this color object from the given integer red, green, and blue components.
